H0.text: wal-mart is a prime example of which type organization. Global Business Enterprise

H1.text: wal-mart is a prime example of which type organization. Large-Scale Employer

H2.text: wal-mart is a prime example of which type organization. Supply Chain Innovator

H3.text: wal-mart is a prime example of which type organization. multinational retail corporation

A4.text: A multinational corporation (MNC) is a corporate organization that owns and controls the production of goods or services in at least one country other than its home country.

A5.text: MNCs can use their global presence to take advantage of underpriced labor services available in certain developing countries and gain access to special R&D capabilities residing in advanced foreign countries.
